item.title: Linux/Ubuntu 下为 Android 创建无线分享热点
item.description: create ap hotspot for ubuntu linux 准备 https://w1.fi/hostapd/ https://github.com/oblique/create_ap 编译 hostapd 1 2 sudo apt-get install libnl-3-dev libnl-gen-3-dev make && sudo make install 安装 create_ap 1 2 git clone https://github.com/oblique/create_ap.git cd create_ap && make install 创建无线热点 1 sudo create_ap wlan0 ppp0 hotspot password
